html:
5.8.20  6:50 pm   What is the greatest instrument?

      the ground

5.8.20  6:33 pm   can i eat pizza pls?

      yes, thank you for checking with me first

5.8.20  6:12 pm   thoughts on spiders?

      they could use more legs

5.8.20  6:01 pm   my choir teacher gave us a final and i'm supposed to make my own track by next Friday... wHERE DO I START??

      write it. decide how it goes before you begin production. when you are writing it, pretend you have a dream production team that is capable of producing any sweet thing you imagine. then, change roles, and while you are producing it, pretend you had a writer so you don't have to worry about how the song goes while producing it

5.8.20  4:57 pm   Why are the words in the titles misspelt? E.g. "ueqstions" instead of "questions".

      it's not ueqstions, it's ueqstions

5.8.20  4:57 pm   Should I write a novel or give up

      you could try writing something a little smaller first

5.8.20  4:46 pm   Is reality a hologram?

      if it is, then i am certainly impressed with the amount of non-holograms it contains

5.8.20  4:33 pm   I have been using the jewish scale and it's gorgeous. But the problem is that hava nagila uses this scales notes but it has some extra ones too.

     ah yes, welcome to Earth

     Do you find these extra ones by doing small mistakes or your brain just surprises you with these?

     not a mistake. that's just the way music is, always has been and can be

      Is there an education for using extra notes too or does that come from experience and ear somethingy?

      experience is education

5.8.20  4:26 pm   what is your favorite time of the day?

      4:32am

5.8.20  4:10 pm   how to summon cat?

      you gotta be quick, before the cat summons you

5.8.20  3:26 pm   Is your hat stll bent?

      it's a spiral

5.8.20  3:20 pm   When did you start making music?

      i don't remember

5.8.20  3:11 pm   How do you spell deoxyrybonucleic acid

      impossible. it can't be done

5.8.20  3:10 pm   i'm sure you get lots of questions that are really just people saying they appreciate your art, do those mean anything to you or do they get annoying? anyway, i think you are one of the best creators of our time period

      holy overland trail, you are very friendly

5.8.20  3:07 pm   How do I ask questions

      impossible. it can't be done

5.8.20  2:51 pm   why do some of your quetions have instant responses

      impossible. it can't be done

5.8.20  2:41 pm   what's higher priority, better music or better graphics?

      better music

5.8.20  2:22 pm   If you were stuck in a tv how would you get out   Just a question it's not like I'm stuck right now

      if you are good enough to get into the TV hall of fame, they let you leave occasionally

5.8.20  2:01 pm   At about 1:28 into "i did a bad thing", there is a little ball on top of your hat. Is it a mic?

      i have a superstition against watching my own videos, but i might guess it was the tag on the hat

5.8.20  1:03 pm   square is circle?

      no but i can see why you would think that

5.8.20  12:55 pm   how to make toast

      you can convince yourself that you are making toast by putting bread into the toaster, but the truth is actually the toast was already pre-made, in the toaster. the average toaster contains 30 pieces of toast, and then after that the toaster "breaks down" but really it was just out of toast

5.8.20  12:41 pm   What makes music good?

      it knows you better than you know yourself

5.8.20  12:39 pm   does this page accept questions?

      ah, i can see why you would think that

5.8.20  12:25 pm   tips on playing guitar?

      impossible. it can't be done

5.8.20  11:22 am   what do you do in your free time?

      my time is actually very expensive

5.8.20  11:22 am   What is 0 divided by 0

      don't worry about it

5.8.20  11:22 am   What do you do if something is scary

      make a folk tale about it

5.8.20  11:12 am   dear Bill, I'm a huge fan. I hope everything is well and you're staying safe through these fairly unpleasant times. I've got a question: what do you think is your biggest source of inspiration for your music?

      the world

5.8.20  11:00 am   How do you make your (amazing) music?

      play in an empty barrel, sometimes that works. if you don't believe me, try a more empty barrel

5.8.20  10:08 am   how are you so impressive ?

      this is just a reflection of the impressive world i have been living in

5.8.20  9:44 am   writing an essay that I not only don't care about but I also know nothing about, how to do it?

      you could assume an alternate identity while writing it. that seems like the only way

5.8.20  9:01 am   you should use the font comic sans ms

      don't worry i've used it

5.8.20  8:34 am   how to stop procrastinating?

      first you much stop saying words like 'procrastinating.' it's a very long word and it wastes a lot of time

5.8.20  8:10 am   what are your thoughts on communism?

      "it just works"

5.8.20  7:16 am   Opinion on woodpeckers?

      try to get the turbo setting

5.8.20  6:48 am   are the voices in my head me or other me

      both

5.8.20  6:13 am   What's your opinion on silent letters?

      perfect way to send a secret message

5.8.20  6:07 am   Why is Greenland called Greenland if there is ice in Greenland should it be called Iceland because there is ice and if Iceland is already taken then what should we call Greenland. I need answers pls. 

      it was a publicity stunt

5.8.20  5:33 am   What keeps you up at night?

      sleeping during the day

5.8.20  5:27 am   Are you making more music?

      how did you know

5.8.20  5:21 am   how can i sleep?

      impossible. it can't be done

5.8.20  5:01 am   what is your favorite song you've made so far? I know you'd prefer to make a new one to be your favorite, but could you please restrict the circle of songs you're picking your favorite from to the songs you already made and are available online?

      absolutely not

5.8.20  3:25 am   how do i make a one note melody sound epic

      change chords around it

5.8.20  3:17 am   What is your MBTI?

      extreme super personality

5.8.20  3:05 am   so in my music playing i have been spending many many years trying to be more complex with fancy scales, chords, and other stuff. i am now realizing that the "simple" stuff is where the magic is.

     that's one of the places where the magic is but not the only place

      but it's a little awkward right now because i have to admit to myself that with all this complexity, i was almost trying to prove my love for music by obsessing over it, but in doing that, i was killing the music. i think that i need to find a healthier balance between technical and emotional content in music. i still want to be able to play my instrument to the best of my ability, but i have to remember that some of the most beautiful music can be played by people who are absolute beginners on their instruments. have you ever felt this way?

      yes

5.8.20  2:46 am   So are you trying to figure out how to do automated motion control photography?

      right now i am figuring out other stuff, but that is also hot on the list

5.8.20  2:36 am   How do I get over creator's block? Really, I struggle with this.

      you must think outside the block

5.8.20  2:35 am   What is your opinion on trees?

      brocolli, for huge people

5.8.20  2:21 am   What is school

      never heard of it

5.8.20  2:04 am   How does one fall asleep? 

      impossible. it can't be done
